articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Negative thinking linked to dementia in later life, but you can learn to be more positive
articles.description: Repetitive negative thinking in later life was linked to cognitive decline and greater deposits of two harmful proteins responsible for Alzheimer's disease, a new study found. But you can fight back by training your brain to be more optimistic.

articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: Apps highlighting black-owned businesses see a surge in support during pandemic and protests
articles.description: As protests for racial justice continue to spring up across the country, so has the push to support black-owned businesses.

articles.author: Theresa Waldrop and Laura Ly, CNN
articles.title: New York plans to move some police funding to youth and social services
articles.description: New York City will move some of its funding from the New York Police Department to youth and social services, Mayor Bill De Blasio said on Sunday.
